item.title: Choosing the right editor
item.description: <h1>Choosing the right editor</h1> <h2>Intro: My editor history</h2> Here are my "credentials". You know, establishing why you should be reading this at all. When it comes to editors, I've honestly fumbled around quite a bit in the past fifteen years or so. I had not encountered an editor until some dude taught my Comp Sci 6/9 class and straight-up went to the GNU webpage and downloaded emacs for Windows.
